Reviews.Title: “Amazing stay once again!”
Reviews.Author: Rheanon S
Reviews.Content: We had previously stayed at this suite and had a great experience so of course we came back. I have to admit this is once of the best hotels I have stayed in. The owners are the sweetest people and definitely know how to treat their customers and the rooms were very well kept. The suites are located in a great area. We will definitely be back again. Thanks Richard!

Reviews.Title: “Family Trip”
Reviews.Author: debbieteague58
Reviews.Content: Daytona Shores Inn & Suites: Great People Friendly will make you feel at home. We could not asked for a better place to stay. Clean rooms, very nice people. I would recommend this place to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “New clean renovated apartment looking big rooms”
Reviews.Author: Rheanon S
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed in a room here. Very nice people, they did great on the renovations! We had a choice between beachside or right across the road from beach access. We stayed across the road and it was almost like an apartment room! It was spacious with nice clean linens, pretty new bed, and was very clean. We will definitely be back and I would definitely recommend Daytona Shores Inn and Suites.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place and Location”
Reviews.Author: mardigrasbabe
Reviews.Content: We stumbled across this wonderful motel after we came in for the coke 400 race at the speedway! Actually we stayed 1 night right across from Richards place! Had to find a room for 3 more nights!walked over and met Richard and that was all she wrote! What a wonderful quaint place to stay! Wonderful management. Clean..comfortable..anything you needed they were there to help you. Will definitely be back next year or sooner! Cant wait to see the new pool after its finished! Thanks for everything Richard! See you soon!

Reviews.Title: “Birthday getaway”
Reviews.Author: katherine b
Reviews.Content: My husband and I found this cozy little suite by searching the net in route to Daytona Beach- my favorite spot in the nation, I had prayed and asked God to guide us to the place we should stay for that weekend. Much to my delight Daytona Shores Inn & Suites is newly remodeled, spacious, clean, and very welcoming. The staff is pleasnt and ready to assist you with whatever we needed. I would strongly recommend this spot for a beautiful Daytona experience,

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Surprise for Daytona Beach !!”
Reviews.Author: Robert R
Reviews.Content: My hubby & I are retired & just wanted to get away for a few days. After checking some motels on the beach we were worried that we would have to go inland when we stopped here & we are so glad that we did. Richard was so kind from check in to out. The room was wonderful, newly renovated & decorated very nice. We had all the amenities of home. Richard told us upon check in that the pool was being worked on & since we were almost directly on the beach it was OK. He did tell us that the pool will be ready in a few weeks which will make this very cozy & quiet Inn a favorite for us. We will be back!! Bud & Pat R

Reviews.Title: “Daytona Shores great location”
Reviews.Author: Chel69
Reviews.Content: New owners were nice and eager to please. We had a very good experience at this hotel. The picture shown for this hotel was our table outside our room. The pool was being remodeled, but not a concern as the beach is as close as most hotels pools! It has a great location with beach access. Security cameras, nice comfortable mattresses. Bathrooms are a small, but how much time do you plan to spend in there? Was also reasonably priced. Clean. No bugs, No spiders! Has a nice little kitchen. Internet access!

Reviews.Title: “Great Spot - Hidden Gem”
Reviews.Author: Gregg D
Reviews.Content: Pulled in here at all most midnight to find just about everything in Daytona on the Beach to be booked. Met the 2 owners who not only had compassion for the BS that we had just been through but also allowed us to check out at 4 for a little extra cash. The room was clean, cute and simple. Nothing too flashy but nothing outdated either and very reasonable for a beach front stay. The price of this compared to everything else was incredible.. I even told the owner he should raise their price when big events are in town like that weekend. He said that he might but he wanted to provide value until the pool was remolded. Awesome stay, Friendly owners. Give this place a shot!!! I'll be back!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “great spot great time”
Reviews.Author: Jeff D
Reviews.Content: we just got back to Canada after we spent our last 2 days of vacation at Daytona Shores. Ok the place is under renovations but the room we had was very clean and the owners Kim and Richard couldnt have been nicer. They are the new owners of only 5 months and are doing there best to improve the place. i will go back anytime and cant wait to see all the renovations done.To the people who gave such a bad review shame on you mistakes happen and give people credit where credit is due. Thanks again Kim and Richard for the great hospitality see you again soon Jeff and Tony fom Canada

Reviews.Title: “Great place.”
Reviews.Author: ciccalec
Reviews.Content: Although the hotel was clearly under renovations, we enjoyed our stay. Our room was newly renovated and VERY CLEAN. The location is beautiful, right on the beach. The owners were helpful and accommodating. Once the renovations are completed this will be a perfect place to stay. Tony, Canada

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL AND RELAXING”
Reviews.Author: Anita M
Reviews.Content: We happened to find this by chance on a working vacation. The room was very clean, the owners were friendly and once they are finished remodeling everything I probably won't be able to afford to stay here!! The location is great, and this will be a jewel when all their plans come together. Individual patios were a bonus. There is a bus stop 1 block north so even without a vehicle I had access to the entire city since there is a very good bus system in place. Don't let the "work in progress" stop you from staying at the best place on the beach. LOVED IT HERE! Thanks for a great vacation.

Reviews.Title: “total dump”
Reviews.Author: d a
Reviews.Content: we had booked a room for bike week,drove all the way from central il.just to find a run down,mismanaged place,the office was run down and dirty,when we went to check in the owners had lost all there bookings on the computer,and only had a room for 2 nights for us,when we ask to see the room,we found the owner making up the bed,this was at 630pm,real good house keeping?,we were able to get our deposit back on the spot,that was the only thing good that happend here.we did find a very nice clean room a few blocks up the street,for same price,these owners need to close up till all the work is complete and they have proper house keeping set up,then maybe it will be a good place,i dont know what kinda dumps the other 2 people that wrote good reviews are used to staying in,but if this place is so great,they have super low standards,or maybe they are blind.

HotelInfo.Name: Daytona Shores Inn and Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 3221 S Atlantic Ave, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
